author: VNExplorer
title: ¿Te imaginas ver de cerca la cirugía de un animal del Zoológico Guadalajara? Conoce CIMBA el hospital veterinario más grande de Latinoamérica
text: Los visitantes pueden observar cada paso de las operaciones de los animales. (Fernando Carranza) El Centro Integral de Medicina y Bienestar Animal (CIMBA) es el hospital veterinario más grande y novedoso dentro de un zoológico latinoamericano, se inauguró en el Zoológico Guadalajara y es abierto al público por lo que se pueden ver cada una de las intervenciones que se hace a los animales de este hábitat. CIMBA forma parte de los grandes proyectos y apuestas del Zoológico Guadalajara y que mejor que en el marco de su 36 aniversario, finalmente abrió sus puertas y ya lleva dos intervenciones en un león y un babuino, dos ejemplares de los más de 6 mil animales de 300 especies diferentes de los 5 continentes que habitan aquí en el Zoológico. “CIMBA del Zoológico Guadalajara es un proyecto que habíamos venido cocinando ya desde hace varios años, el zoológico siempre ha tenido un hospital y siempre había estado lejos y fuera de la vista del público y hoy con CIMBA lo hemos traído a la parte central con el objetivo de abrir esto que es el corazón del Zoológico, que es el cuidado y el bienestar animal para todo el público”, detalló Luis Soto Rendón, director general del Zoológico Guadalajara. Cada año más de un millón de personas visitan el Zoológico Guadalajara, que ahora con esto CIMBA le brindará un plus mayor a los visitantes. La gente podrá observar desde la preparación de dietas, una revisión médica de rutina hasta una intervención quirúrgica que suceda en ese momento, todo de manera segura y didáctica, pues cuentan con un módulo educativo y material didáctico que enriquece la visita con recorridos guiados. “Esta es la tercera edición de hospital que tiene el zoológico, pero en esta ocasión quisimos ir más allá de dotarlo de la más alta tecnología, tiene de crear los mejores espacios para la adquisición de los animales. Quisimos invitar a la gente a que fuera parte de este proceso y que lo pudiera ver muy de cerca de manera muy transparente para que se dé cuenta del nivel de atención y el esfuerzo que hacemos”, explicó el director. Intervienen a babuino En esta ocasión, en el CIMBA los visitantes fueron testigos de la intervención de un babuino, luego de una pelea con otro primate. Claudia Galindo una de las médicos veterinario zootecnistas que intervino en la cirugía del babuino y explicó a detalle el trabajo. “Dentro del grupo, pues hay muchos obviamente y tiene que haber hay una jerarquía, entonces se pelearon en días pasados y hoy se hizo su revisión porque traía una herida entonces anestesia y se aprovecha para hacer una revisión completa, se hacen tomas de muestras de sangre y tomamos una radiografías que tenemos. Hay una duda con una mano, entonces tomamos radiografías y suturamos heridita que traía procedimientos que en monos de todos se hace muy seguido porque si es como una pelea del diario”, detalló. Para ellos, esto fue una intervención sencilla que por supuesto estando cerca de seis personas en quirófano, pero están preparados para la intervención de animales o especies más grandes, donde refieren que han estado hasta 20 personas dentro. ¿Cómo visitar el CIMBA? El ingreso a CIMBA está incluido en los tres paquetes GuadaZoo, Premier y Diamante de acceso al Zoológico Guadalajara y es apto para todas las edades. ​MC ​

author: Hanneke Sanou
title: Elderly tourist found alive in Spain after night in the open - DutchNews.nl
text: Elderly tourist found alive in Spain after night in the open A 75-year-old Dutch tourist who went missing in a mountainous area in southern Spain on Wednesday has been found alive, local Spanish [media](https://www.axarquiaplus.es/rescatan-a-un-anciano-holandes-con-alzheimer-en-murcia-tras-perderse-en-un-viaje-de-alicante-a-malaga/) reported. The man, who suffers from Alzheimer’s disease, was on a journey from Alicante to Malaga with his family and had stopped at a local look-out point in the Ricote Valley in Murcia when he wandered off. Rescue workers mounted an intensive search but only found him after drone footage showed the man walking around aimlessly the next day. He was exhausted, Gurdia Civil officers said, but otherwise unhurt. The case is the last in a spate of incidents involving missing tourists. Several tourists have [died](https://www.dutchnews.nl/2024/06/dutch-tourist-found-dead-in-car-in-crete/) from heat-related incidents in Greece and some are still missing. Thank you for donating to DutchNews.nl. We could not provide the Dutch News service, and keep it free of charge, without the generous support of our readers. Your donations allow us to report on issues you tell us matter, and provide you with a summary of the most important Dutch news each day. [Make a donation](/donate-to-dutchnews-nl)

author: NBC Sports BayArea
title: How Kerr fueled Jackson-Davis, Warriors' rebounding success
text: The Warriors, despite their lack of size, lead the NBA in rebounds per game with 47.4. A key reason for Golden State’s success on the boards has been rookie Trayce Jackson-Davis, who is averaging 8.8 rebounds per game in just 20.8 minutes across the Warriors' last five games. At Warriors practice on Wednesday, the flourishing 23-year-old explained the reason behind his and the team’s outstanding rebounding. Stay in the game with the latest updates on your beloved Bay Area and California sports teams! [Sign up here for our All Access Daily newsletter.] “I think the biggest thing for us, honestly, is our coach [Steve Kerr] just continues to tell us constantly to crash,” Jackson-Davis told reporters. “It’s either crash or get back. And he doesn’t allow guards not to. Guards can crash. You see [Brandin Podziemski] in there all the time getting rebounds, and our guards crashing is actually huge for us as well. “I think when you have guards and bigs that are all crashing the glass, one guy back, it really puts pressure on the defense and gets rebounds.” Kerr’s emphasis on team-wide rebounding efforts has paid dividends for Golden State through its first 30 games. While bigs like Kevon Looney and Jackson-Davis to do most of the heavy lifting on the glass, guards like Podziemski are thriving in the rebounding department, with the Santa Clara product averaging 5.4 rebounds per contest. Golden State Warriors Golden State’s rebounding continues to improve, which is uncanny considering the team’s shorter stature. “Honestly, the game goes by so fast and there’s a lot of possessions,” Jackson-Davis explained. “But just the second- and third-point opportunities are huge for us and huge for our team. “And then limiting [opponents], that’s another huge thing that [Kerr] preaches, ‘Boxing out.’ Boxing out is huge for us. So just limiting teams to one possession and then us getting two to three possessions helps us, being a smaller team.” Jackson-Davis stands at 6-foot-9, but recently has stood out in Kerr’s developing rotation. The Warriors’ elite rebounding allows for extended possessions, which is what a team featuring superstar Steph Curry desires.

author: La rédaction avec AFP
title: Allemagne. Volkswagen se prépare à un mouvement de grève dans ses usines à partir de lundi
text:
Allemagne Volkswagen se prépare à un mouvement de grève dans ses usines à partir de lundi
Les salariés des usines du constructeur automobile allemand Volkswagen sont appelés à cesser le travail à partir de lundi, pour s'opposer aux milliers de suppressions d'emplois envisagées.
L’activité pourrait tourner au ralenti dans [les usines allemandes de Volkswagen cette semaine](/economie/2024/11/26/les-entreprises-qui-veulent-fermer-des-sites-gagnent-de-l-argent). Pour s’opposer à la menace de milliers de suppressions d’emplois, les salariés du constructeur automobile allemand sont appelés à cesser le travail à partir de ce lundi dans les usines, a annoncé ce dimanche 1er décembre le syndicat IG Metall. « Si nécessaire, ce sera la bataille de négociation collective la plus dure que Volkswagen ait jamais connue », prévient dans un communiqué le négociateur du syndicat, Thorsten Gröger, à l'issue de la période de dialogue social obligatoire pour 120 000 employés de la marque en Allemagne.
Ce vendredi, le constructeur, qui prépare un plan drastique d'économies, avait rejeté une contre-proposition syndicale visant à réduire les coûts sans avoir à fermer d'usines en Allemagne, laissant augurer d'un durcissement du dialogue social.
Plusieurs propositions refusées
« Des grèves d'avertissement commenceront lundi dans toutes les usines », a indiqué Thorsten Gröger, qui tient la direction « responsable, à la table des négociations, de la durée et de l'intensité de cet affrontement ». Dans un communiqué séparé, Volkswagen a dit « respecter » le droit des salariés à participer à une grève d'avertissement et dit « croire en la poursuite d'un dialogue constructif pour parvenir à une solution durable et soutenue collectivement ».
L'entreprise précise avoir « anticipé des mesures ciblées pour sécuriser l'approvisionnement d'urgence » pendant le mouvement, et ce afin de « limiter autant que possible » son impact « sur nos clients, nos partenaires et nos installations industrielles ».
Alors que Volkswagen a annoncé en septembre travailler sur [un programme pour redresser sa compétitivité](/economie/2024/12/01/nouvelle-chute-des-immatriculations-de-voitures-neuves-au-mois-de-novembre), les discussions en cours entre la direction et les responsables syndicaux, en vertu du principe de cogestion, n'ont pas permis de trouver d'accord sur les mesures de restructuration.
Trois usines menacées de fermeture
Les représentants des salariés avaient présenté en novembre une contre-proposition incluant la suspension de bonus, d'augmentations de salaires, un allègement du temps de travail, permettant, selon eux, d'éviter des fermetures d'usines en Allemagne et des licenciements en masse. Mais cette offre n'a pas été jugée viable par la direction.
Les représentants du personnel affirment qu'au moins trois usines Volkswagen risquent de fermer en Allemagne et que des dizaines de milliers d'emplois pourraient être supprimés, les employés restants devant consentir à des réductions de salaire.
Dans le pays, Volkswagen compte dix sites de production de voitures et environ 300 000 salariés, dont 120 000 pour la marque VW, la plus concernée par le plan d'économies. Fleuron de l'industrie automobile allemande, Volkswagen souffre à la fois du ralentissement du marché des véhicules neufs, de la concurrence chinoise, de modèles à batterie pas assez attractifs, et de coûts de main d’œuvre plus élevés que ses rivaux, selon les experts.

author: 网易
title: 午评：创业板指半日跌超1% 全市场超4600只个股下跌|概念股|沪指|涨停_网易财经
text:
网易财经6月19日讯 市场早盘震荡走低， 创业板 指领跌。沪深两市半日成交额7878亿，较上个交易日放量448亿。
盘面上热点较为杂乱， 个股 跌多涨少，全市场超4600只个股下跌。从板块来看，机器人 概念股 展开反弹，江苏雷利涨超10%。固态电池概念股一度冲高，丰元股份 涨停 。PCB概念股持续活跃，中京电子涨停。
下跌方面，创新药概念股持续调整，常山药业20CM跌停。
板块方面，游戏、PCB、电池、人形机器人等板块涨幅居前，可控核聚变、港口、军工、创新药等板块跌幅居前。
截至收盘， 沪指 跌0.86%，深成指跌1.01%， 创业板指 跌1.1%。
本文来源：网易财经 责任编辑： 钟齐鸣_NF5619

author: Betania Vidal
title: This is the 5-step skincare routine that makes Jennifer Aniston look 20 years younger - Metabolic
text:
Jennifer Aniston is a timeless beauty icon. From her radiant complexion to her effortlessly youthful glow, she makes 50 look like 30 without missing a beat. Her secret is a mix of smart skincare habits, healthy living, and a touch of luxury treatments—but surprisingly, her routine isn’t all Hollywood glam. You can replicate many of her tips at home.
If you’ve ever wondered how she keeps her skin looking so flawless, we’ve got you covered. Here’s a look at Jennifer Aniston’s favorite skincare habits and why they are so effective.
Jennifer Aniston’s 5-step skin routine
These are the key steps the actress follows to keep her skin radiant and youthful.
1. Moisturize and protect daily
Her routine is all about hydration, and it starts with her skincare. As the face of Aveeno, she’s a big fan of their Positively Radiant Hydrating Facial. She uses it as an overnight mask to wake up with glowing skin. Plus, sunscreen is non-negotiable. Aniston also adds a product with SPF daily to shield her skin from harmful UV rays and prevent premature aging.
2. Stay hydrated inside and out
Water is her best-kept secret. Jennifer drinks around 100 ounces of water daily to keep her skin plump and refreshed. As the longtime spokesperson for SmartWater, she’s always promoting the benefits of staying hydrated. “Water, sleep, and sunscreen” are the ultimate anti-aging combination for her.
3. Glow from the inside
Her beauty philosophy goes beyond skincare. Her diet contains fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins. Fried foods and soda are off her plate, while alcohol is kept to a minimum since it can dry out the skin. This healthy diet fuels her radiant complexion and keeps her looking youthful.
4. Indulge in luxury treatments
The actress loves microcurrent facials, which she describes as a workout for her face. She’s also a fan of the Clear and Brilliant laser for a quick, non-invasive refresh, and Thermage treatments to stimulate collagen production. These cutting-edge therapies help smooth and tighten her skin.
5. Personal spa days at home
For a more budget-friendly approach, Jennifer turns to at-home remedies. She exfoliates three times a week using Aveeno’s Skin Brightening Daily Scrub and enjoys a relaxing “spa day” on Sundays. Her routine includes masks, scrubs, and plenty of self-care to keep her skin in top shape.
Why Jennifer’s routine works
Jennifer’s beauty habits are grounded in consistency and balance. She focuses on maintaining healthy skin from the inside out and doesn’t rely solely on expensive treatments. Her approach proves that good genes, combined with smart choices, can go a long way in achieving youthful skin. And let’s not forget her secret weapon: a positive attitude toward aging. Jennifer’s philosophy is to embrace the process and treat your skin with the same care you’d give to anything valuable.
If you’re dreaming of glowing skin like Jennifer Aniston’s, her routine is a great place to start. Drink plenty of water, protect your skin with SPF, and invest in self-care. While the luxury treatments are a nice touch, her simple, affordable tips make it clear that anyone can prioritize their skin and feel fabulous at any age.

author: la rédaction avec AFP
title: 'Lapider' les homosexuels, l’appel du président burundais - rtbf.be
text: Le mariage homosexuel "pratique abominable", des couples gay à "lapider" car ils ont "choisi le diable" et attirent la "malédiction" divine : le président burundais Evariste Ndayishimiye s’est livré à une virulente diatribe contre l’homosexualité. Le chef de l’Etat de ce pays de l’Afrique des Grands Lacs chrétien et conservateur, où les relations entre personnes de même sexe sont sanctionnées de peines allant jusqu’à deux ans de prison, s’exprimait lors d’une conférence publique dans la province de Cankuzo retransmise à la radio et à télévision, répondant aux questions de la presse et de la population. "Vous m’avez posé une question sur cette pratique abominable qui fait qu’un homme se marie avec un autre homme et une femme avec une autre femme", a-t-il déclaré, avant d’évoquer la Bible. "Je vous dis la vérité, si vous voulez attirer la malédiction sur un pays, il faut laisser les gens de même sexe se marier. Vous vous souvenez de ce qui est arrivé à Sodome et Gomorrhe ? Dieu en est arrivé alors à dire : Je regrette d’avoir créé l’homme", a-t-il ajouté. "Personnellement, je pense que si on voit ce genre d’individus au Burundi, on devrait les mettre dans un stade et les lapider avec des pierres. Et ce ne serait pas un péché pour ceux qui le feront !", a estimé Evariste Ndayishimiye, qui avait déjà appelé cette année à "bannir" les homosexuels. Il s’en est également pris aux pays occidentaux, qui affichent régulièrement leur opposition aux violations des droits de la communauté LGBTQ +. "Vous avez dit que les pays occidentaux tentent de forcer les petits pays pour qu’ils adoptent cette pratique, et qu’ils ne recevront aucune aide s’ils ne s’y conforment pas. Qu’ils gardent leur aide, qu’ils la gardent !", a-t-il lancé.

author: Editor EBR
title: The Complete Guide to Packaging for Small Businesses: Cost-Effective, Eco-Friendly, and Eye-Catching Solutions - The European Business Review
text:
Packaging is not just a protective shell for your products; it’s your brand’s ambassador, the first physical interaction customers have with your business. For small businesses, finding the right packaging solutions might be challenging. You need options that are cost-effective, visually appealing, and ideally, eco-friendly. This guide will provide a comprehensive overview of the various packaging supplies Los Angeles , from bulk poly mailers to wholesale cardboard packaging, and help you discover how to strike the perfect balance between practicality, sustainability, and branding.
Why Packaging Matters for Small Businesses In the competitive e-commerce market, your packaging is one of the main elements that differentiate your brand from others.
First Impressions: The Unboxing Experience The moment a customer receives your package and opens it is a golden opportunity to create a positive first impression. Unique and eye-catching packaging enhances the unboxing experience, making customers feel valued and excited about their purchase. This positive experience can lead to increased customer satisfaction, positive reviews, and repeat business.
Brand Reinforcement: Packaging as a Marketing Tool Your packaging is an extension of your brand identity. It should reflect your brand’s values, personality, and aesthetics. By incorporating your logo, color scheme, and brand messaging into your packaging, you create a cohesive brand experience that strengthens customer recognition and loyalty.
Protection and Functionality: Ensuring Safe Delivery While aesthetics are important, the primary function of packaging is to protect your products during shipping. Choosing the right packaging materials and ensuring proper packing techniques can minimize the risk of damage, returns, and unhappy customers.
Types of Packaging Materials: A Diverse Range of Options Small businesses have a wide variety of packaging materials to choose from, each with its own advantages and considerations.
Bulk Poly Mailers: Lightweight and Versatile Bulk poly mailers are a popular choice for e-commerce businesses due to their lightweight nature, durability, and cost-effectiveness. They’re ideal for shipping clothing, accessories, and other non-fragile items. They come in various sizes, colors, and features, such as tear-proof or tamper-evident options.
Wholesale Cardboard Packaging: Sturdy and Customizable Cardboard boxes are a classic choice for packaging, offering excellent protection. Purchasing wholesale cardboard packaging can be a cost-effective option, especially for businesses with high shipping volumes. Cardboard boxes can also be easily customized with your brand logo, colors, and messaging.
Insulated Boxes for Shipping Food: Keeping Perishables Fresh For businesses shipping perishable food items, insulated boxes are a must. Insulated boxes for shipping food help maintain a consistent temperature during transit, ensuring that food arrives fresh and safe for consumption. Consider eco-friendly alternatives to traditional Styrofoam boxes, such as those made from recycled materials or biodegradable materials like cornstarch.
Eco-Friendly Packaging: A Growing Trend As consumers become more environmentally conscious, businesses are increasingly turning to sustainable packaging solutions. Eco-friendly packaging not only reduces your environmental impact but also appeals to eco-conscious customers.
Recycled and Biodegradable Materials. Opt for packaging materials made from recycled content or biodegradable materials like cornstarch or bamboo. These options help reduce waste and minimize your carbon footprint.
Reusable Packaging. Consider offering reusable packaging options, such as cloth bags or sturdy boxes that customers can return for future purchases.
Minimalist Packaging. Adopt a minimalist approach to packaging by reducing unnecessary materials and using right-sized packaging for your products.
Cost-Effective Packaging Solutions: Saving Money Without Sacrificing Quality Packaging costs can quickly add up, especially for small businesses. However, there are numerous ways to save money without compromising the quality or aesthetics of your packaging.
Buying in Bulk Purchasing packaging supplies in bulk can often lead to significant cost savings. Consider partnering with a wholesaler to get the best deals on bulk poly mailers , cardboard boxes, and other essentials.
Optimizing Packaging Costs: Smart Strategies for Savings Beyond buying in bulk, several other strategies can help you reduce packaging costs. Reusing materials like boxes and packing peanuts whenever possible can significantly cut down on expenses. Another option is to explore alternative packaging materials, such as biodegradable packing peanuts or shredded paper, which can be more affordable than traditional options. Additionally, try negotiating with suppliers for volume discounts or exploring partnerships with other small businesses to leverage collective buying power and secure lower prices on packaging supplies.
Right-Sizing Your Packaging: A Balancing Act Choosing the right size packaging for your products is a balancing act. Don’t use oversized boxes or mailers, as this way you waste materials and increase shipping costs due to dimensional weight pricing. On the other hand, using packaging that’s too small can lead to product damage. Take the time to measure your products and select packaging that fits snugly while allowing for adequate cushioning and protection.
Streamlining the Fulfillment Process: Efficiency and Accuracy Efficient order fulfillment is crucial for small businesses, as it directly impacts customer satisfaction and repeat business.
Inventory Management: Staying Stocked. Maintain accurate inventory levels so that you have enough packaging supplies on hand to fulfill orders promptly. Use inventory management software or set up alerts to notify you when supplies are running low.
Automation: Saving Time and Resources. Automating certain aspects of your fulfillment process, such as label printing or order tracking, can free up your time and resources, allowing you to focus on other aspects of your business.
Partnering with Fulfillment Centers: Scaling Your Operations. As your business grows, partner with a fulfillment center to handle your packaging and shipping needs. This cost-effective solution will allow you to focus on product development and marketing while ensuring that your orders are fulfilled efficiently and accurately.
Conclusion Choosing the right packaging for your small business goes beyond mere functionality; it’s a strategic investment that significantly impacts your brand’s identity, customer satisfaction, and business growth. Opting for wholesale cardboard packaging can be particularly advantageous as it strikes a balance between cost-effectiveness and sustainability. Not only does it provide a sturdy and reliable option for product protection during transit, but it also showcases your commitment to eco-friendly practices.
The aesthetic appeal of well-designed packaging can enhance the unboxing experience for your customers, turning each delivery into a memorable moment. By prioritizing these factors – cost-effectiveness, sustainability, aesthetics, and functionality – you ensure the safe delivery of your products and solidify your brand’s reputation as one that cares about quality and environmental responsibility. This thoughtful approach to packaging enhances customer satisfaction, fosters loyalty, and encourages repeat business, contributing to the long-term success of your enterprise.
Go to top

author: The Canadian Press
title: Tearful vigil held as Northwest Territories reel from fatal plane crash - Greater Victoria News
text: A tearful candlelight vigil was held at the cathedral in Fort Smith, N.W.T., on Wednesday evening, after a plane carrying seven people went down near the town’s airport a day earlier. Two crew members and four passengers headed for work at the Diavik Diamond Mine were killed. Mine owner Rio Tinto says the lone survivor was also a company worker. Fort Smith’s three churches came together to organize the vigil, which included prayer, song, and calls from community leaders to support each other and stay strong. First responders and RCMP officers were among the attendees at the packed gathering in a community of roughly 2200 people. Rev. Aaron Solberg of St. John’s Anglican Church says they were looking to offer people encouragement and stability. The Transportation Safety Board of Canada continues to investigate the deadly crash. READ ALSO: [2 flight crew, 4 miners dead in Northwest Territories plane crash](https://www.missioncityrecord.com/national-news/2-flight-crew-4-miners-dead-in-northwest-territories-plane-crash-7300949)
